Subject: File Server All Activity job failing
Description: We found that the File ServerAll Activity job is failing with an error of Stealthbits.StealthAUDIT.DataCollectors.FSAA.FSAAException: Unable to start scan: Could not initialize scan session with any proxy host supplied We need the results of this job for a legal issue ASAP
What_We_Know__c:
FSAC jobs were failing with errors of:

"No Row at Position 0." --debug message linked to "Unable to connect to secure stream"
--- We installed HF 11.6.0.57 and then updated the proxy server need ATM with the FS_UpdateProxy job

"Unable to start scan: Could not initialize scan session with any proxy host supplied"
--- We set the Applet Launch Mechanism to "Require applet to be running as a service on target"

Customer needed data from 8/31 and 11/4. Looks like the jobs have been erroring since 8/14., so we don't have data on the 8/31 date, but we do have data for the 11/4 (NAM retention 10 days)

We also discussed how to use the NAM console to investigate and export results.

At the end of our session, the FSAC scan had successfully run on 3/4 hosts with the last host compressing and sending over T2s. Bulk Import is scheduled to run after.
Next_Steps__c: Customer will report back tomorrow on how the overnight scans looked
Solution_Comment__c:
FSAC jobs were failing with errors of:

--- We installed HF 11.6.0.57 and then updated the proxy server need ATM with the FS_UpdateProxy job
